attributes.review: I was just trying to see our president’s plans for our country, my phone ended up crashing a lot and it would glitch out my phone a lot
attributes.title: Bad app!

attributes.review: This app is disgusting. It wont let me delete it off my phone and each time i launch it it crashes.
attributes.title: Crashes every second

attributes.review: I absolutely hate this app not only did my phone crash while downloading but the app would not even start I was just wondering what stupid ordeals trump was planning but I guess it’s just not meant to be. DO NOT GET THIS APP THE STORAGE ON YOUR PHONE IS VALUABLE AND SHOULD NOT BE USED IN THIS VULGAR WAY!
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: This app is horrible! There’s this            🍊orange🍊 thing all over it o thought the president was supposed to be on there! Is the app being hacked?!?🤡 the Cheeto should not ban TikTok or we will ruin his life😪🧚🏻‍♀️✨ how sad 😭 keep TikTok up and I’ll change my mind................maybe
attributes.title: 💅🏻TikTok✨

attributes.review: do NOT get this app! the 15 year old boy who commented MAGA on my instagram when i posted about equal rights inspired me to download the app and see if our wonderful orange 🍊 had anything good to say :))) fun fact, he actually didn’t!!
attributes.title: 🧚🏻‍♂️awful🥰

attributes.review: It stole all of my information of my phone! 😵 It also glitches and took 5 days to download.  Overall, this is a very bad app. This NEEDS to be removed off of the app store asap. 😰
attributes.title: it’s just BAD.

attributes.review: I was just playing my x box and I took a sip of this nasty juice so I tried to go downstairs to get more juice but I tripped on a banana peel and fell down the stairs breaking my back. It a spurt of fury and stress my cat had a heart attack and died. So it’s Donald trumps apps fault.
attributes.title: The app killed my cat

attributes.review: I downloaded this app the other day and since then I have noticed it saving data from my phone and sending it to the chinese government 🤢 I LOVE my fans 💖 but not this one 🧚🏻💖
attributes.title: Stole ALL my data and sold it to China 🤢

attributes.review: The app took at least a week to download and now my phone is full of viruses, I’m positive it’s because of this terrible app, please get this thing off the App Store.
attributes.title: Awful and disappointing

attributes.review: I was rlly looking forward to using this app bc ✨Cheeto✨ and then I realized I hated cheetos. This app was hard to use even tho i never actually used it. Apparently it hacks data which isn’t good. Will be deleting immediately
attributes.title: Yeet
